CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(Department__c, "|"), IF( FIND("|", Department__c, FIND("|", Department__c) + 1) > 0, MID( Department__c, FIND("|", Department__c) + 1, FIND("|", Department__c, FIND("|", Department__c) + 1) - FIND("|", Department__c) - 1 ), RIGHT(Department__c, LEN(Department__c) - FIND("|", Department__c)) ), "" )
CustomField.label: Dept 2
